DOC.detailed_description: - Subject > 18 year age . - Females subject must either document post-menopausal , surgically incapable bearing child , woman childbearing potential , use barrier contraceptive method must negative serum pregnancy test screening . - Subject candidate endovascular thoracic aortic repair . - Subject TAA meet one follow criterion : - Is diagnose Fusiform Focal TAA > 5cm , - Is diagnose Fusiform Focal TAA diameter < 5 cm exhibit rapid expansion , - Is diagnose Fusiform Focal TAA diameter ≥ 4.5 cm least twice size normal DTA , - Is diagnose saccular TAA size .
DOC.criteria: Subject > 18 year age . Female subject either document postmenopausal , surgically incapable bearing child , woman childbearing potential , use barrier contraceptive method negative serum pregnancy test screening . Subject candidate endovascular thoracic aortic repair . Subject TAA meet one follow criterion : 1 . Is diagnosed Fusiform Focal TAA ≥5cm , 2 . Is diagnosed Fusiform Focal TAA diameter ≤ 5 cm exhibit rapid expansion , 3 . Is diagnosed Fusiform Focal TAA diameter ≥ 4.5 cm least twice size normal DTA , 4 . Is diagnosed saccular TAA size ( potential rupture increased* ) . Tortuosity angulation exceed 90 degree . Subject arterial access site allow introduction stentgraft delivery system . Subject life expectancy < 2 year . Subject lesion prevents safe delivery expansion device . Subject concomitant ascend aortic aneurysm . Subject known allergy device material . Subject coagulopathy bleeding disorder pretreated . Subject contraindicate contrast medium anticoagulation drug pretreated .
